00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.DerbyDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase.AlterTableVisitor;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;

00017 import org.w3c.dom.Document;

00020 import java.util.*;
00021 
00025 public class MergeColumnChange extends AbstractChange {
00026 
00027     private String schemaName;
00028     private String tableName;
00029     private String column1Name;
00030     private String joinString;
00031     private String column2Name;
00032     private String finalColumnName;
00033     private String finalColumnType;
00034 
00035     public MergeColumnChange() {
00036         super("mergeColumns", "Merge Column");
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getSchemaName() {
00040         return schemaName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00044         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getTableName() {
00048         return tableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00052         this.tableName = tableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getColumn1Name() {
00056         return column1Name;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setColumn1Name(String column1Name) {
00060         this.column1Name = column1Name;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public String getJoinString() {
00064         return joinString;
00065     }
00066 
00067     public void setJoinString(String joinString) {
00068         this.joinString = joinString;
00069     }
00070 
00071     public String getColumn2Name() {
00072         return column2Name;
00073     }
00074 
00075     public void setColumn2Name(String column2Name) {
00076         this.column2Name = column2Name;
00077     }

00080         return finalColumnName;
00081     }

00085     }

00095     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00096         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00097             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00098         }
00099         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column1Name) == null) {
00100             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("column1Name is required", this);
00101         }
00102         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(column2Name) == null) {
00103             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("column2Name is required", this);
00104         }
00105         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(finalColumnName) == null) {
00106             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("finalColumnName is required", this);
00107         }
00108         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(finalColumnType) == null) {
00109             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("finalColumnType is required", this);
00110         }
00111 
00112     }
00113 
00114     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00115 
00116         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00117 
00118         AddColumnChange addNewColumnChange = new AddColumnChange();
00119         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00120         addNewColumnChange.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00121         addNewColumnChange.setTableName(getTableName());
00122         ColumnConfig columnConfig = new ColumnConfig();
00123         columnConfig.setName(getFinalColumnName());
00124         columnConfig.setType(getFinalColumnType());
00125         addNewColumnChange.addColumn(columnConfig);
00126         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addNewColumnChange.generateStatements(database)));
00127 
00128         String updateStatement = "UPDATE " + database.escapeTableName(schemaName, getTableName()) + " SET " + getFinalColumnName() + " = " + database.getConcatSql(getColumn1Name(), "'"+getJoinString()+"'", getColumn2Name());
00129 
00130         statements.add(new RawSqlStatement(updateStatement));
00131         
00132         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00133                 // SQLite does not support this ALTER TABLE operation until now.
00134                         // For more information see: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html
00135                         // This is a small work around...
00136                 
00137                         // define alter table logic
00138                 AlterTableVisitor rename_alter_visitor = new AlterTableVisitor() {
00139                         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd() {
00140                                 ColumnConfig[] new_columns = new ColumnConfig[1];
00141                                 ColumnConfig new_column = new ColumnConfig();
00142                         new_column.setName(getFinalColumnName());
00143                         new_column.setType(getFinalColumnType());
00144                                 new_columns[0] = new ColumnConfig(new_column);
00145                                 return new_columns;
00146                         }
00147                         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00148                                 return !(column.getName().equals(getColumn1Name()) ||
00149                                                 column.getName().equals(getColumn2Name()));
00150                         }
00151                         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00152                                 return !(column.getName().equals(getColumn1Name()) ||
00153                                                 column.getName().equals(getColumn2Name()));
00154                         }
00155                         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index) {
00156                                 return !(index.getColumns().contains(getColumn1Name()) ||
00157                                                 index.getColumns().contains(getColumn2Name()));
00158                         }
00159                 };
00160                 
00161                 try {
00162                         // alter table
00163                                 statements.addAll(SQLiteDatabase.getAlterTableStatements(
00164                                                 rename_alter_visitor,
00165                                                 database,getSchemaName(),getTableName()));
00166                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00167                                 e.printStackTrace();
00168                         }
00169                 
00170         } else {
00171                 // ...if it is not a SQLite database 
00172                 
00173                 DropColumnChange dropColumn1Change = new DropColumnChange();
00174                 dropColumn1Change.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00175                 dropColumn1Change.setTableName(getTableName());
00176                 dropColumn1Change.setColumnName(getColumn1Name());
00177                 statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(dropColumn1Change.generateStatements(database)));
00178         
00179                 DropColumnChange dropColumn2Change = new DropColumnChange();
00180                 dropColumn2Change.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00181                 dropColumn2Change.setTableName(getTableName());
00182                 dropColumn2Change.setColumnName(getColumn2Name());
00183                 statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(dropColumn2Change.generateStatements(database)));
00184         
00185         }
00186         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00187 
00188     }
00189 
00190     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(@SuppressWarnings("unused") DerbyDatabase database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00191         throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Derby does not currently support merging columns");
00192     }
00193 
00194     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00195         return "Columns "+getTableName()+"."+getColumn1Name()+" and "+getTableName()+"."+getColumn2Name()+" merged";
00196     }
00197 
00198     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00199         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00200         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00201             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00202         }
00203 
00204         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00205         element.setAttribute("column1Name", getColumn1Name());
00206         element.setAttribute("joinString", getJoinString());
00207         element.setAttribute("column2Name", getColumn2Name());
00208         element.setAttribute("finalColumnName", getFinalColumnName());
00209         element.setAttribute("finalColumnType", getFinalColumnType());
00210 
00211         return element;
00212     }
00213 
00214     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00215         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00216         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00217         returnSet.add(table);
00218 
00219         Column column1 = new Column();
00220         column1.setTable(table);
00221         column1.setName(column1Name);
00222         returnSet.add(column1);
00223 
00224         Column column2 = new Column();
00225         column2.setTable(table);
00226         column2.setName(column2Name);
00227         returnSet.add(column2);
00228 
00229         return returnSet;
00230     }
00231
